ttbasetheme.smartMerchand.title: Allow Smart Merchand module for TT Base Theme Extension
ttbasetheme.smartMerchand.description: The Tavano Team  Smart Merchand module lets you add a carousel of products using Site Management Tools. Using Smart Merch you can display products based on item attributes to offer a dynamic shopping experience based on saved search results.
